thread.section_title: Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. | totallywicked-eliquid.com
thread.title: Simon
thread.title_full: Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. reviewed by Simon

author: Simon
title: Simon
text: I ordered a smok V8 baby RBA from them. I haven't used PayPal in years since I had a disagreement with their customer service and this was the only place that not only had it in stock, but also accepted debit cards. They make sure kids don't get a hold of any ecig products and even online have age verification, which may seem a bit of a hassle but it's a good decision if you ask me. Product came sooner than expected. Spent maybe about $17 including shipping. All said and done it was a very good experience.
